In England, in the seven days to 23 March, there were 497,626 new confirmed cases (880.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 March, there were 442,194 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% (55,432 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 March is 17,603,000 (31,128.1 cases per 100,000 population).
